Line 89: Line 89:
==Windows To Go==
==Windows To Go==
â
Windows To Go is an upcoming Windows 8 feature that will allow used to create bootable USB Flash drive with Windows 8 in it, including the users programs, settings and files, efectivly making it a [[Live USB]].<ref>http://www.computerworld.com/s/article/9220004/Windows_8_will_run_from_USB_thumb_drive?taxonomyId=125</ref><ref>http://www.gmanews.tv/story/232480/technology/windows-8-fits-on-a-thumb-drive</ref><ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/Windows-8-Running-on-a-USB-Windows-To-Go-221470.shtml</ref>
+
Windows To Go, alternativly called ''Portable Workspace''<ref>http://pureinfotech.com/2011/09/14/run-windows-8-from-a-usb-device-with-windows-to-go/</ref> is an upcoming Windows 8 feature that will allow used to create bootable USB Flash drive with Windows 8 in it, including the users programs, settings and files, efectivly making it a [[Live USB]].<ref>http://www.computerworld.com/s/article/9220004/Windows_8_will_run_from_USB_thumb_drive?taxonomyId=125</ref><ref>http://www.gmanews.tv/story/232480/technology/windows-8-fits-on-a-thumb-drive</ref><ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/Windows-8-Running-on-a-USB-Windows-To-Go-221470.shtml</ref>
